summary: The 'Stop ANTIFA Act of 2025' aims to designate Antifa as a domestic terrorist organization, citing acts of violence, obstruction of law enforcement, and threats against political figures. The bill mandates investigations by the National Joint Terrorism Task Force (JTTFs), outlines strategies for disrupting Antifa networks, and directs the Attorney General to prioritize prosecution of related federal offenses. It also includes measures to identify and disrupt financial networks supporting domestic terrorism and mandates updates to the President on progress.
